# Tibble Function

## 1. Brief description
Tibble is a native data structure in R that helps to display data in a form that is easy to read and manipulate. The tibble function provides R users with an easier way to interact with a data frame.

## 2. What package contains it
The tibble function is part of the dplyr package.

## 3. When to use it
